name: SETUP: Create Table
command: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT, email TEXT);

name: LOAD: Insert 100k Users
command: INSERT INTO users (id, name, email) VALUES (%d, 'user%d', 'user%d@example.com');

name: OLTP: Point-Select on Primary Key
command: SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1500;

name: OLTP: Point-Select on Missing Key
command: SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1000000;

name: OLTP: Point-Select on Indexed Column
command: SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email = 'user1234@example.com';

name: OLTP: Simple Update
command: UPDATE users SET name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 1500;

name: OLAP: Aggregate with Group By
command: SELECT SUBSTR(email, INSTR(email, '@') + 1) as domain, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY domain ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5;

name: OLAP: Aggregate with Filter
command: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'user1%';
